oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Martha White Show - Lester Flatt and the Nashville Grass - 1977-05-04 - WSM
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Multiple recordings of two Martha White Shows, featuring Grant Turner (host), Lester Flatt (host/performer), Kenny Ingram (performer), Benny Martin (performer), Marty Stuart (performer), the Nashville Grass (performers), and special guest John Hartford (performer) on radio station WSM (Nashville, Tenn.) First recording is from May 4, 1977 and second recording is from May 5, 1977.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Nashville Grass; Kenny Ingram; Lester Flatt; John Hartford; Benny Martin; Marty Stuart
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Test tones -- Opening theme -- Opening statement (Grant Turner) -- Lester Flatt introduces Benny Martin -- Orange Blossom Special (Benny Martin) -- Martha White commercial (Grant Turner and Lester Flatt) -- Lester Flatt introduces John Hartford -- Let Him Go On Mama (John Hartford) -- Lester Flatt talks about Hartford's performance -- Call Me On Home, Too (Lester Flatt) -- Martha White commercial (Grant Turner) -- Old Fashion Preacher (Kenny Ingram and Marty Stuart) -- Closing theme -- Closing statement (Grant Turner) -- Opening theme -- Opening statement (Grant Turner) -- Lester Flatt introduces John Hartford -- The Julia Belle Swain (John Hartford) -- Martha White commercial (Grant Turner and Lester Flatt) -- Down The Road (Lester Flatt) -- Lester Flatt talks about the song he performed -- He's Coming Back, He Told Us So (Lester Flatt) -- Martha White commercial (Grant Turner) -- Live And Let Live (Kenny Ingram and Marty Stuart) -- Pike County Breakdown (Kenny Ingram banjo) -- Closing theme -- Closing statement (Grant Turner)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); Turner, Grant; Martin, Benny; Flatt, Lester, 1914-1979; Hartford, John; Ingram, Kenny; Stuart, Marty;
